name: Super Mario Bros. 3 New Super Mario Bros. Wii Style
name_original: Super Mario Bros. 3 New Super Mario Bros. Wii Style
description:
Play Super Mario Bros. 3, but it looks and sounds like New Super Mario Bros. Wii!

Use the Left Arrow to Move Left.

Use the Right Arrow to Move Right.

Use the Up Arrow to Jump.

Use the Spacebar to Spin Jump.

Use the Spacebar in Mid-Air to Air Spin.
